document.full_text: rescuers pulled a seventh body from a collapsed coal mine in northern mexico on friday as families gave up hope of finding seven other trapped workers alive after an explosion earlier this week.
document.title: families desperate to recover bodies at mexico mine
lines_and_colors: rescuers pulled a seventh body from a collapsed coal mine in northern mexico on friday as families gave up hope of finding seven other trapped workers alive after an explosion earlier this week.
